subject: Golf
Restaurants
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: As Woods prepares for his 18th P.G.A. Championship, business and philanthropic interests competing for his attention may be distracting him from his effort to regain standing among golf’s elite players.
snippet: As Woods prepares for his 18th P.G.A. Championship, business and philanthropic interests competing for his attention may be distracting him from his effort to regain standing among golf’s elite players.
